title: @RIOT More Base MP5 For Ashe
body:
Hey,

All I play is Ashe every single game and its great.
I only play this game to play Ashe.
If Ashe was not in the game I would not play and I would have to go play Drow Ranger.
I have played since season one and I am sure I have played at least 5,000 Ashe games and most would still consider me bad, still I firmly believe **Ashe needs more base MP5.
**
Also even playing 5,000 Ashe games I really struggle to kite people without buying every single movement speed item with attack speed built in (even then its much easier to just spam volley behind me... which lets face it is unskilled and not fun), so having something changed on Ashe where kiting with AA is just that little bit easier to do would be great.
I don't care if I am considered wrong. I do care that the issue gets looked at.


Ty for reading.

replies.body:
I agree that Ashe is a very fun champion to play with.
I activate the Q only against champions and late in the game I don't feel that mana is an issue.
I feel like too many players don't know that Ashe is good from mid to late game.
I often get blamed by "rude" smarf players at the beginnig of the game because Ashe can't do much damage but the good result is there at the end of the game!

Nah, Riot are too busy giving Kalista more damage...

Also you could use Essense Reaver, it gives back enough mana on attack to have Ashe Q always on.
Whenever I play ARAM as her I grab Essence Reaver and leave Q on. It is so good.
